subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Two days after defeating one of the N.B.A.’s best teams, the Nets needed a game-winning shot from Joe Johnson in double overtime to beat the Wizards, who are the league’s worst team.
snippet: Two days after defeating one of the N.B.A.’s best teams, the Nets needed a game-winning shot from Joe Johnson in double overtime to beat the Wizards, who are the league’s worst team.
